publication.abstract:
This document describes the implementation of a class for the Insight Toolkit (ITK) that takes an image
with multi-component pixels and outputs a scalar image for each component. This can be useful when
examining images of vectors, tensors, etc. This ﬁlter may be easier to use and require fewer pixel visitations than an itk::ImageAdaptor with a similar purpose, but it requires additional memory allocation.
